external_references.description: Gruzweig, J. et al. (2021, March 2). Operation Exchange Marauder: Active Exploitation of Multiple Zero-Day Microsoft Exchange Vulnerabilities. Retrieved March 3, 2021.

description: [HAFNIUM](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0125) gathered the fully qualified domain names (FQDNs) for targeted Exchange servers in the victim's environment.(Citation: Volexity Exchange Marauder March 2021)
